## Description
 Boil up Soymilk, add Epsom Salt as Coagulant,&#10;&#9;&#9;&#9;gently stir and heat, and the curds will separate.

|Power Required:|1.0 kW/hr|

|[stove](/docs/definitions/part/stove)|Part|1|

|--------:|:------|
